Hey guys!

I started my internship (or learning-teaching practicum for the 
purists) last monday and I'm having a lot of fun. I'm now the student 
teacher of 25 kids learning English as their second language in an 
intensive class. The whole thing is just great.

However, it takes all my day off because I leave home at 6h15 am. I 
even have to work on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, so I am totally out for 
these two days.

So, I'll try my best to post, but if my chars block the storyline, 
either make them do the small thing they need to do or ask Robo or 
Airly to play a key character if it's more important.

Thanks!

Nic
